title: I am in the middle of house loan; Should I pay my medical debt collection?
question: I have a collection with medicredit since May 2016; I offered to pay the full balance if they will remove it from my credit, but they say no, that they will update my credit as paid in full. Should I pay it so it can show as paid? or leave it alone? I owe then $550.00 not sure if the $ has anything to do or not.
answers: If this is going to affect your chances of getting the home loan, then yes, pay the debt. It s a minimal amount compare to losing out on the loan.
